channel.title: Klamath County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Klamath County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Distance Marker on OR-138 West
item.description: Distance marker on OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Crater Lake, and Roseburg. Taken just west of Diamond Lake Junction.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-58
item.description: US-97 South at OR-58 in Klamath County. Use OR-58 west to Eugene and Oakridge (via Willamette Pass). Continue south on US-97 for Klamath Falls and California.

item.title: CA-161 West at Hill Road
item.description: CA-161 West at Hill Road. Turn left for Hill Road south to Lava Beds National Monument and Klamath Basin National Wildlife Refuge.

item.title: CA-161 West
item.description: CA-161 west shield. The Oregon-California line runs along CA-161 so that the north side of the highway is in Oregon.

item.title: OR-39 South at CA-139 and CA-161
item.description: OR-39 south at CA-139 and CA-161. Turn right for CA-161 West to Dorris (California). Turn left on State Line Road to Malin (Oregon). Continue straight on CA-139 south to Tulelake (California). The California-Oregon state line runs along the CA-161 and State Line Road. OR-39 becomes CA-139 at the state line.

item.title: OR-39 South - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on OR-39 south. The Welcome to California sign is north of the Oregon-California line which runs along CA-161.

item.title: OR-39 South at Malin Jct.
item.description: OR-39 South at Malin Jct. Turn right to continue south on OR-39 for Tulelake (California) and Reno (Nevada). Continue ahead to for Malin. The Klamath Falls-Malin Highway continues towards Malin. OR-39 follows the Hatfield highway southbound.

item.title: OR-39 South - Malin Jct.
item.description: OR-39 South approaching Malin Jct.

item.title: OR-39 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-39 south. Distance to Malin and Tulelake (California).

item.title: OR-39 South - Lost River
item.description: Lost River on OR-39 south.

item.title: OR-140 East at OR-39
item.description: OR-140 East at OR-39 in Klamath County. Turn right for OR-39 south to Merrill. Turn left for OR-140 East (Unsigned)/OR-39 North to Klamath Falls and Lakeview.

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 West approaching OR-39. Use OR-39 south for Merrill; use OR-39 North/OR-140 East for Klamath Falls, Lakeview, and Klamath Falls Community College. OR-140 east joins OR-39 north.

item.title: OR-140 East Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 East approaching OR-39.

item.title: Washburn Way South at OR-140 East
item.description: Washburn Way South at OR-140 East. Use OR-140 east for OR-39 and Merrill. Continue south on Washburn Way for Kingsley Field.

item.title: Washburn Way South at OR-140 West
item.description: Washburn Way south at OR-140 west to Medford, and US-97. Continue south on Washburn Way for Kingsley Field and Merrill.

item.title: Main St. at OR-39
item.description: Main St. at OR-39 (Crater Lake Parkway) in Klamath Falls. Turn left for OR-39 north to Bend and Crater Lake (both via US-97). Turn right for OR-39 south to Merrill.

item.title: Oregon St. West at US-97 South
item.description: Oregon St. West at US-97 South to Weed (California). Continue west for Lake of the Woods and Medford (both via Lakeshore Drive and OR-140).

item.title: OR-39 North - Entering Klamath Falls
item.description: Entering Klamath Falls on OR-39 north. Klamath Falls is the county seat of Klamath County.

item.title: OR-39 North (6th St.) at Crater Lake Parkway
item.description: OR-39 North (6th St.) at Crater Lake Parkway. Turn right to continue north on OR-39 to US-97, Crater Lake, and Bend.

item.title: OR-140 West at OR-39
item.description: OR-140 west at OR-39 near Klamath Falls. Turn right for OR-39 north to Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue straight for OR-39 South/OR-140 West to Merrill (OR-39) and Medford (OR-140).

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39
item.description: OR-140 West Approaching OR-39 to Klamath Falls, Merril, and Medford. OR-140 joins OR-39 south.

item.title: OR-140 West - Olene
item.description: Entering Olene on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-140 west. Distance to Olene and Klamath Falls.

item.title: OR-140 West at OR-70
item.description: OR-140 West at OR-70 East to Bonanza and Lorella.

item.title: OR-140 West Approaching OR-70
item.description: OR-140 West approaching OR-70 in Dairy.

item.title: OR-140 West - Dairy
item.description: Entering Dairy on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Bonanza Junction
item.description: OR-140 west approaching Bonanza Junction.

item.title: OR-140 West - Bly Mountain Pass
item.description: OR-140 west at Bly Mountain Pass. Elevation 5085 Feet.

item.title: OR-140 West - Beatty
item.description: Entering Beatty on OR-140 west.

item.title: OR-140 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on OR-140 east leaving Bly. Distance to Beatty and Klamath Falls.

item.title: Washburn Way North at OR-140 West
item.description: Washburn Way north at OR-140 west to Medford and Bend, and US-97. Continue north on Washburn Way for City Center (Klamath Falls). The OR-140 shield is incorrectly represented as a US shield.

item.title: OR-140 East - Exit 3
item.description: OR-140 east at Exit 3 - Washburn Way. OR-140 crosses south of Klamath Falls proper along the Southside Expressway.

item.title: OR-140 East at US-97 North
item.description: OR-140 east at US-97 north. Use US-97 north of Klamath Falls and Bend. Continue east on OR-140 for Lakeview, and OR-39 to Merill. OR-140 meets OR-39 on the east side of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-66/OR-140
item.description: US-97 south at OR-66/OR-140 junction. Use OR-66/OR-140 west for Keno, Ashland, and Medford. Use OR-140 east for Lakeview. This is the eastern end of OR-66.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 277
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 277 - OR-66/OR-140/Lakeview/Medford.

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive
item.description: US-97 south offramp at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive. Use Oregon Ave. for City Center (Klamath Falls). Use Lakeshore Drive for Lake of the Woods

item.title: US-97 South at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive Exit
item.description: US-97 south at Oregon Ave./Lakeshore Drive exit. Oregon Ave. heads east into downtown Klamath Falls. Lakeshore Drive follows the west shore of Klamath Lake before joining up with OR-140.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-39/Bus. US-97
item.description: US-97 south at OR-39/Bus.US-97 south to Klamath Falls and Reno (Nevada). US-97 continues south towards Weed and San Francisco (California).

item.title: US-97 South Approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39
item.description: US-97 south approaching Bus. US-97/OR-39. Continue south on US-97 for Weed and San Francisco.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-62
item.description: US-97 south at OR-62 to Fort Klamath and Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-62
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-62 junction.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south at Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - Fort Klamath/Sprague River.

item.title: US-97 South - Exit 247
item.description: US-97 south approaching Exit 247 - OR-422/Chiloquin/Crater Lake.

item.title: Silver Lake Road at US-97
item.description: Silver Lake Road at US-97. Use US-97 south for Klamath Falls. Use US-97 north for Chemult.

item.title: US-97 North - Silver Lake Road
item.description: US-97 north at Silver Lake Road. Use Silver Lake Road for Klamath Marsh National Wildlife Refuge HQ and Silver Lake.

item.title: Silver Lake Road - Entering Klamath County
item.description: Entering Klamath County on Silver Lake Road west. All Klamath County welcome signs display the text, We Honor Veterans.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: US-97 South - Worden
item.description: Entering the community of Worden on US-97 south.

item.title: US-97 South Overhead
item.description: Distance marker on US-97 south for Weed, and OR-66/OR-140 junction. Leaving the city of Klamath Falls.

item.title: US-97 South - Klamath Falls City Center Exit
item.description: US-97 south approaching the Klamath Falls City Center exit.

item.title: Distance Marker on OR-138 West
item.description: Distance marker on OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Crater Lake, and Roseburg. Taken just west of Diamond Lake Junction.

item.title: Cascades Closure Information
item.description: Road closure information for OR-230, OR-138, and Crater Lake in the Oregon Cascades. Closures are listed in a simple route diagram.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-138
item.description: US-97 south at OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: US-97 North approaching OR-58
item.description: US-97 north approaching OR-58 to Oakridge and Eugene.

item.title: US-97 North at OR-138 West
item.description: US-97 north at OR-138/N. Umpqua Highway to Roseburg and Medford.

item.title: US-97 North at OR-58/Eugene
item.description: US-97 North to Bend/OR-58 to Eugene split.

item.title: US-97 North of OR-138
item.description: US-97 north shield at OR-138 junction.
